original: BLOMBERG, Knut Hugo, Civilingenjör, Direktörsassistent, Stockholm, f Sthlm 25/10 97 av sjökapt J G B o Cecilia Palman, gm Eva Westergren. Studex NReal 16, KTH (el-tekn) 16—20. Anst v Vattenf.styr 21, Pat- o Registr.vkt 22—23, Telegraf styr :s linjebyrås konstr.avd 23—29, Telef.AB L M Ericsson Sthlm sed. 30, ch f dess tekn avd sed. 36. Av trycket: Telegrafi, Elektr bildöverf o Telefoni i Uppfinn :s bok III (27) mm. Led Sv Tekn.frn.
translated:
BLOMBERG, Knut Hugo, Civil Engineer, Director's Assistant, Stockholm, born in Stockholm on October 25, 1897, to sea captain J G B and Cecilia Palman, married Eva Westergren. Studied at NReal 16, KTH (electrical engineering) 16-20. Employed at Vattenf.styr 21, Pat- o Registr.vkt 22-23, Telegraf styr :s linjebyrås konstr.avd 23-29, Telef.AB L M Ericsson Stockholm since 30, appointed head of its technical department since 36. Published works include: Telegrafi, Elektr bildöverf o Telefoni i Uppfinn :s bok III (27) etc. Member of the Swedish Technical Association.

Note: "ch f dess tekn avd sed. 36" indicates that the person became the head of the technical department in the year 1936.

structured.name: Knut Hugo Blomberg
publications: Telegrafi, Elektr bildöverf o Telefoni i Uppfinn :s bok III (27)
